Module project
Package project.game.player

Class SettingsManager

java.lang.Object
project.game.player.SettingsManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SettingsManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class is included in a Player instance and will save the current chosen language, the theme and their preferred volume of sound effects and background music.
See Also:
